Total Executions
properties.description: The total number of executions of the phishing investigation workflow

properties.name: Total Suspicious Observables
properties.description: The total number of suspicious observables processed by the phishing investigation workflow

properties.name: Total Attachments
properties.description: The total number of attachments processed by the phishing investigation workflow

properties.name: Total Clean Observables
properties.description: The total number of clean observables processed by the phishing investigation workflow

properties.name: Report Recipients
properties.description: A list of email addresses to send the report to. The email addresses should either be comma separated or each on their own line

properties.name: Retention Period (Days)
properties.description: How many days to keep statistics in the global table. After this number of days, records will be purged. Depending on how often the phishing workflow is executed, this should be something relatively short like 7 days

properties.name: Total Unknown Observables
properties.description: The total number of unknown observables processed by the phishing investigation workflow

properties.name: Report Time Span (Days)
properties.description: The number of days to include in the report.  Note that this is a rolling period calculated from when the workflow runs. As in, when the workflow runs, it takes the current time and subtracts the number of days provided

properties.name: Email Text
properties.description: A placeholder that will be used to build the HTML content for the email. Anything you put here will be overwritten. To make changes to the email, update the Email Template variable or the "Build the statistics table" and "Replace email placeholders" activities

properties.name: Total Malicious Observables
properties.description: The total number of malicious observables processed by the phishing investigation workflow

Generates an email with statistics about the phishing response workflow's operations. The number of days included in the report can be customized using the "Report Time Span (Days)" local variable. The number of days of data kept in the global table can be configured using the "Retention Period (Days)" local variable.

Target Group: Default TargetGroup

Targets: SMTP Endpoint for your SMTP server named "Phishing Investigation Outgoing"

Account Keys: Email Credentials for your SMTP account

Steps:
[] Calculate and format the dates needed to generate the report
[] Fetch rows from the global statistics table for this reporting period
[] Loop through the table records and calculate each row's workflow run time
[] Process the data into an email and send the message
[] Clean up the global statistics table (purge old records)

More information: https://ciscosecurity.github.io/sxo-05-security-workflows/workflows/0010B

properties.script:
import sys

# Get and expand the list of runtimes
runtimes = []
if len(sys.argv) > 1:
	runtimes = sys.argv[1].split(",")

# Remove any blanks
while("" in runtimes):
	runtimes.remove("")

# Placeholders for the average runtime
averageSeconds = 0
averageMinutes = 0

# Check that there are runtimes to process
if len(runtimes) > 0:
	# Add up the runtimes
	for i in range(0, len(runtimes)):
		runtimes[i] = float(runtimes[i])

	# Calculate the average run time
	averageSeconds = (sum(runtimes) / len(runtimes))
	averageMinutes = round((averageSeconds / 60), 1)
